reviewText: I loved these movies when I was a kid and am glad I picked them up now on DVD. Good deal!
All three of them play and don't skip I'm glad i bought it it gives me time with my family
comedies back in the 70's were instant funny then compared to comedies today, also you didn't have to be afraid of offending someone by your actions or words.
Purchased this movie, because my niece and nephews are huge baseball fans.
The original Bad News Bears is an awesome movie. Walter Matthau is way better than Billy Bob.
The first one is very good.  The second one is alright....The third one should be cast into the gorge of eternal peril!

Its great seeing boys being boys and doing what boys do best, without all the smut that producers seem to include in movie's today, I think anyone young or old will think this box set of the Bad News Bears is great for a laugh, if you want a good night in front of the box give these movie's a watch, I promise a good night.
